content: कलित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Held, seized, taken; <ls>U. 5. 5.</ls> {@--2@} Broken; <ls>Pt. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Plucked, gathered; <ls>U. 3. 6.</ls> {@--4@} Arisen, produced; <ls>U. 5. 2</ls>; कलितकुलिशघाताः केपि खेलंति वाताः <ls>R. G.</ls> {@--5@} Influenced; <ls>Māl. 8.</ls> {@--6@} Mixed; <ls>Māl. 10. 10.</ls> {@--7@} Known, understood; <ls>Māl. 8. 13</ls>, <ls n="Māl.">2. 9.</ls> {@--8@} Furnished, endowed, <ls>Māl. 6. 6</ls>; <ls>Ku. 6. 76.</ls> {@--9@} Gained, obtained. {@--10@} Reckoned, counted. {@--11@} Separated, divided. {@--12@} Sounded indistinctly, murmured.
